super_attack.effect: Raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Chief of All Demons
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Extreme Class allies' ATK & DEF 30% up; When attacking: ATK & DEF 50% up; Per "Demonic Power" Category ally or Extreme Class ally on the team (depending on which has more members): ATK & DEF 10% up when attacking (up to 50%); When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Demonic Power" Category characters, or when all allies are Extreme Class characters: Guards all attacks
